last_episode_to_air.name: The End
last_episode_to_air.overview: Will Frank finally be able to prove his innocence?

name: Home Grown
overview: A local Belgian potato farmer loses all his money and tries to earn it back by growing cannabis.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview: This season contains special episodes of "Eigen Kweek".

episodes.name: An Interesting Investment
episodes.overview: Jos Welvaert, a farmer in the town of Wijtschate, decides to make an investment, through his cousin Geoffrey.

episodes.name: My Mother Came Along
episodes.overview: Jos and Steven set out to the Netherlands, to buy the necessary supplies for their plan to work. Meanwhile, Frank is trying to get some alone time with Julita.

episodes.name: Operation Bud-Tokers
episodes.overview: Steven is caught using weed at the parking of the local swimming pool. Jos is afraid Ria will discover his secret. Frank takes Julita out for the first time.

episodes.name: What Is That With The Washing Machine?
episodes.overview: Ria is furious with Jos about his illegal business and has moved out. Ninita is trying to convince Julita to take the money from Lucien and return to the Philippines.

episodes.name: For 7x70 Times
episodes.overview: Finally, Jos and Steven's hard work pays off. The batch is ready to be sold. An old acquaintance returns and Julita wants to work, much to Frank's dismay.

episodes.name: And No Cops!
episodes.overview: Jos has a bad feeling when it comes to selling the weed. Julita is kidnapped in a case of mistaken identity. The deck is stacked against the Welvaert family and they might lose it all.

episodes.name: There's a Gentleman
episodes.overview: It's been 4 years since Julita's kidnapping and things seem to have settled down. That is, until a relative of one of Julita's kidnappers is released from prison and wants revenge.

episodes.name: Stay Out of My Drawers!
episodes.overview: Jos has not other choice but the grow another big batch of weed. He is trying to keep Steven out of it this time. Julita wants a new car. Griet is trying to awaken fatherly feelings in Steven.

episodes.name: Colorado Beetles
episodes.overview: Jos, Bernard and the brother of 'den Ollander' have to deal with an unexpected guest at the hangar. Frank has a secret.

episodes.name: Sick from Stockholm
episodes.overview: Chantal is determined to catch the criminals who wronged her and her daughter. Trying to cover up his own secrets, Frank stumbles onto other secrets.

episodes.name: Jos, Untie Me
episodes.overview: Jos, Steven and Bernard are dealing with their problem. Frank wants to have no part of it at all.

episodes.name: The Code from a Dream from Mama
episodes.overview: Jos is still trying to find the evidence against him while the drugs deal is happening.

episodes.name: Busy Doing Something
episodes.overview: Chantal realizes that the Welvaert family has been growing weed.

episodes.name: Accused of Something
episodes.overview: The Welvaert family knows why Chantal has been giving them the cold shoulder.

episodes.name: All Alone
episodes.overview: Frank is thrown in jail for something he didn't do.

episodes.name: No Kotje Kotje
episodes.overview: Chantal enlists the help of Frank.

episodes.name: Ze Blow Up Job
episodes.overview: Maurice gets out the big guns.

episodes.name: The End
episodes.overview: Will Frank finally be able to prove his innocence?
